content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Manually add IP addresses to discover internet-facing assets December 4, 2023—Trend Vision One now supports manually adding seed IP addresses for discovering internet-facing assets in your organization. In the Internet-Facing Assets section of Attack Surface Discovery, click the Public IPs tab and then click Add to manually add up to 1,000 seed IP addresses. To view a list of added seed IP addresses, click View Manually Added IP Addresses. The ability to add seed IP addresses is only available for customers using a Trend Micro solution as the data source for internet-facing assets and that do not have an active trial for Cyber Risk Exposure Management. Cyber Risk Exposure Management → Attack Surface Discovery © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Manually add IP addresses to discover internet-facing assets
